p: Majority of both active and inactive compounds have chromlogD 7.4 values in the range 1–3.3 and in general, higher values are obtained for a set of active compounds. Exceptions to this are active compound 6a with chromlogD 7.4 value of 0.92, and inactive compound 6 g that seems to be the one of the most lipophilic compounds with chromlogD 7.4 value 3.27.
